column5: Just Finished watching the show and it was great! Not a huge fan of the saltwater fishing, but Dave sure kept me entertained!!! I was hoping for some Ontario fishing but hey it was good. Sorta like flipping docks for largies eh?   This show is the perfect blend of funniness (Thanks Dave) and awesome fishing knowledge. I hope you can keep it going for many years to come Dave!  -Ben
i think we need clarification on the winning of the touque.....lol....i came in at 7.35............but in the original thread   good luck
i was stressed for time joey.....lol.....rules did not state how well and thought out a review was needed......lol....but yes it was a great show....rough waters and all....talk bout sore arms.....
Ill give them both one.... please post the reviews to the original thread so I can keep all the entries in one place!!  That means you Ben... lol  PM me your mailing address Ben.
